script.name: plugin.jj.true.relations.notorieties
script.description: Applies dynamic notoriety changes depending on recent changes and relationship with other races.

line.comment: * DESCRIPTION: Applies dynamic notoriety changes depending on recent changes and relationship with other races.
* - - - 0: version, 1: activated, 2: pageID, 3: debug, 4: races, 5: notorieties, 6: sectors to fix
* - - - ignore $i = 0 because we assume player is at index 0 in races array
* only multiples of 5 are allowed they say

sval.val: Applies dynamic notoriety changes depending on recent changes and relationship with other races.
DESCRIPTION: Applies dynamic notoriety changes depending on recent changes and relationship with other races.
- - - 0: version, 1: activated, 2: pageID, 3: debug, 4: races, 5: notorieties, 6: sectors to fix
- - - ignore $i = 0 because we assume player is at index 0 in races array
only multiples of 5 are allowed they say
